Justin Sullivan/Getty Images It's no secret that first impressions are important, and even more so when it comes to job hunting.
Statistics show that recruitment managers only spend between five to seven seconds reading a resume, and that they also know in the first 90 second of an interview whether they will hire someone.
If anything, this goes to show that silly mistakes on a CV and behaviour during interviews could win you - or cost you - your dream job.
As December is the best time to start job hunting, now is also the best time to clean up your CV and take it to the next level, as well as improve on skills which could be handy during possible interviews.
If you're looking to improve your resume and ace your interviews, David Jones best-selling course 'Career Hacking: Resume, LinkedIn®, Interviewing + More' is for you.
The MBA holder and co-founder of Eazl promises to help anyone earn more, be able to connect with anybody, and work on getting yourself a meaningful network of professional contacts by investing time in your CV as well as in improving skills for interviews.
More importantly, the course has more than 9,800 students enrolled, 898 reviews, and a 4.5 star rating. Needless to say, it will help any job hunter get ahead of the competition.
The class, which usually costs £75, will now only set you back a mere £18 using the code "UDEMY1275" at checkout. A price which will hardly burn a hole in your wallet, considering it will give you a lifetime of knowledge on how to create an amazing CV, as well as help you put your best foot forward during an interview.
